title: Bloodmoon Elise
body: why is it unavailable and how can I get it?

replies.body: She'll be available later this patch. :]
How much later in this patch? I just bought her and was hoping to nab the skin asap xD
Rito, I'm throwing money at my screen and I still can't use the skin D: Why must you make me wait to give you moneyz?
Wow, red post, long time no see. Hoping to see more of you, as there are many new decent threads here ;3
Cause it hasn't been released yet. Will most likely be released on Thursday when skins are usually released (especially since Tuesday is the release of the winter skins) .
I can't wait for it, I have been waitnig since before they recoloured it.
Yea IKR, the skin is filllllthy. Great job riot
